product.name: Marcelle BB Cream-to-Powder Makeup
product.description:
A perfect addition to Marcelle's best skin enhancing line, Marcelle BB Cream-to-Powder Makeup has a creamy texture at first touch, but transforms to a
 silky, powdery finish upon contact with the skin. Its practical compact
 with mirror and sponge built-in is ideal for all-day touch-ups to 
maintain a perfect and even skin. Can be used alone or over the BB Cream
 for more coverage.

Hypo-allergenic and perfume-free. Paraben free, oil free, and non-comedogenic. Shade Range:
